name: DarkSouls like shellhack project
description:
Inspiration

I think is pretty obvious that my biggest inspiration was Dark Souls. I have always been a fan of the saga as well as a fan of RPG games. I hope to one day be able to release a completed open world RPG of my own. This project small project has taken me one step closer to accomplish my dreams

What it does

This a very simple project, the idea was to have a boss fight similar to the Dark Souls saga. In the current stage of the project you can roam area a define area and fight against the boss.

How we built it

The project was built using Unreal Engine. C++ was used to handle all the math and the most complex system and blueprints were used to handle most of the simple systems.

Challenges we ran into

I ran into many challenges in this project, specially with time. I was doing this as solo developer because I was unable to find someone else to help with this project. The project was made in about 15 hours. As of now I have only slept 4 hours.

Accomplishments that we're proud of

I'm very proud but I'm running out of time lol.
